name: Get new, active/inactive and total scenarios for each team sent to a Google Sheet
description:
Obtain updated scenario data for every team for the previous month, including new, active, and inactive scenarios, conveniently consolidated and delivered to your Google Sheet for easy analysis.

The scenario executes on the 1st of the month, extracting the data from the previous month. Each month will have its own sheet in your spreadsheet with headings created for you.
